short_summary: The Canadian Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for one (1) Upright Freezer.
description: The Canadian Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for one (1) Upright Freezer.
full_summary:
# TSX Series Upright -80 Freezer (TSX 70086A) Tender Invitation

## Tender Details

* Tender Identification Number: `cb-6679-79043272`
* Amendment Number: `1`
* Solicitation Number: `2024-00107`
* Posting Date: `2023-06-22`
* Closing Date: `2023-08-01 T 14:00:00`
* Last Amendment Date: `2023-08-01`
* Expected Contract Start Date: `2023-09-01`
* Expected Contract End Date: `2024-09-01`

## Contract Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is soliciting proposals for one (1) Upright Freezer (TSX Series -80) - model TSX 70086A. 

## Tender Data

* UN/SPSC Code: `41103005`
* Description: Ultra cold or ultralow upright cabinets or freezers

## Procurement Method

* Competitive Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Regions

* Business Opportunity Region: Canada
* Delivery Region: Ottawa

## Tender Documents

Visit [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6679/2024-00107-npp---apm.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6679/2024-00107-npp---apm.pdf) for tender documents.
